content: A federal appeals court on Friday derailed a proposed wage-and-hour class action against logistics and shipping giant C.H. Robinson Worldwide Inc by enforcing an arbitration agreement with a class-action waiver.
name: CH Robinson Worldwide Inc
title: C.H. Robinson's arbitration agreement blocks classwide wage claims - 9th Circuit

content: BEIJING China's main state planning body has granted a subsidiary of automotive design contractor CH-Auto permission to build 50 000 electric vehicles per year  the third startup automaker to gain approval under a new licensing system.
name: CH Robinson Worldwide Inc
title: China gives third startup permission to make green cars

content: March 15 Greater demand for logistics services could propel the shares of C.H. Robinson Worldwide Inc  by as much as 50 percent  according to Barron's.
name: CH Robinson Worldwide Inc
title: Shares of logistics company C.H. Robinson could jump -Barron's

content: WASHINGTON The U.S. Navy on Thursday said it was launching a more intensive effort to ensure that any wiring or fuel line problems with its CH-53E and MH-53E heavy-lift helicopters are corrected as quickly and effectively as possible.
name: CH Robinson Worldwide Inc
title: Navy plans more intensive review of H-53 helicopters

content: WASHINGTON  Feb 5 The U.S. Navy on Thursday said it was launching a more intensive effort to ensure that any wiring or fuel line problems with its CH-53E and MH-53E heavy-lift helicopters are corrected as quickly and effectively as possible.
name: CH Robinson Worldwide Inc
title: U.S. Navy plans more intensive review of H-53 helicopters
